quote: In Shahid's view, the best way through difficult times, as through life in general, was just to go along with things. It was a rare problem that couldn't be solved by being ignored.
quote_letters: IN SHAHIDS VIEW THE BEST WAY THROUGH DIFFICULT TIMES AS THROUGH LIFE IN GENERAL WAS JUST TO GO ALONG WITH THINGS IT WAS A RARE PROBLEM THAT COULDNT BE SOLVED BY BEING IGNORED
